payload.content: Figma has released a new feature that allows UI work created in Claude Code to be directly imported into Figma as editable design frames.

name: Figma has released a new feature that allows UI work created in Claude Code to b
content: Figma has released a new feature that allows UI work created in Claude Code to be directly imported into Figma as editable design frames.

payload.content: The Claude Code to Figma integration can be used to explore new design ideas, visualize multi-page flows on the Figma canvas, or reimagine user experiences.

name: The Claude Code to Figma integration can be used to explore new design ideas, vi
content: The Claude Code to Figma integration can be used to explore new design ideas, visualize multi-page flows on the Figma canvas, or reimagine user experiences.
